verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
"On the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> you shall <S%H6965>set<s%> up the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%>
"And you shall <S%H7760>place<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> and you shall <S%H5526>screen<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> with the <S%H6532>veil.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> in the <S%H7979>table<s%> and <S%H6186>arrange<s%> <S%H6187>what<s%> <S%H6187>belongs<s%> on it; and you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> in the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> and <S%H5927>mount<s%> its <S%H5216>lamps.<s%>

"Moreover, you shall <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> and <S%H7760>set<s%> up the <S%H4539>veil<s%> for the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> to the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> in <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%>
"And you shall <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H3595>laver<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> in it.
"And you shall <S%H7760>set<s%> up the <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> and <S%H5414>hang<s%> up the <S%H4539>veil<s%> for the <S%H8179>gateway<s%> of the <S%H2691>court.<s%>

"Then you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> and <S%H4886>anoint<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that is in it, and shall <S%H6942>consecrate<s%> it and <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H3627>furnishings;<s%> and it shall be <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H4886>anoint<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H3627>utensils,<s%> and <S%H6942>consecrate<s%> the <S%H4196>altar;<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar<s%> shall be <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy.<s%>
"And you shall <S%H4886>anoint<s%> the <S%H3595>laver<s%> and its <S%H3653>stand,<s%> and <S%H6942>consecrate<s%> it.

"Then you shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> to the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> and <S%H7364>wash<s%> them with <S%H4325>water.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H3847>put<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> on <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H4886>anoint<s%> him and <S%H6942>consecrate<s%> him, that he may <S%H3547>minister<s%> as a <S%H3547>priest<s%> to Me.
"And you shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H3847>put<s%> <S%H3801>tunics<s%> on them;

and you shall <S%H4886>anoint<s%> them <S%H9201>even<s%> as you have <S%H4886>anointed<s%> their father, that they may <S%H1>minister<s%> as <S%H3547>priests<s%> to Me; and their <S%H3547>anointing<s%> shall <S%H4888>qualify<s%> them for a <S%H1961>perpetual<s%> <S%H5769>priesthood<s%> throughout their <S%H3550>generations.<s%> "
Thus <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6213>did;<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him, <S%H3651>so<s%> he <S%H6213>did.<s%>

Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> of the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> on the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> that the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> was <S%H6965>erected.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6965>erected<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> and <S%H5414>laid<s%> its <S%H134>sockets,<s%> and <S%H7760>set<s%> up its <S%H7175>boards,<s%> and <S%H5414>inserted<s%> its <S%H1280>bars<s%> and <S%H6965>erected<s%> its <S%H5982>pillars.<s%>

And he <S%H6566>spread<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H4372>covering<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> on <S%H4605>top<s%> of it, <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

Then he <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> [it] into the <S%H727>ark,<s%> and <S%H7760>attached<s%> the <S%H905>poles<s%> to the <S%H727>ark,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> <S%H3727>seat<s%> on <S%H4605>top<s%> of the <S%H727>ark.<s%>

And he <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> into the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and <S%H7760>set<s%> up a <S%H6532>veil<s%> for the <S%H4539>screen,<s%> and <S%H5526>screened<s%> <S%H5526>off<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

Then he <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H3409>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> <S%H4480>outside<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H6532>veil.<s%>

And he <S%H6186>set<s%> the <S%H6187>arrangement<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> in <S%H6186>order<s%> on it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

Then he <S%H7760>placed<s%> the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> <S%H5227>opposite<s%> the <S%H7979>table,<s%> on the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H3409>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>
And he <S%H5927>lighted<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
Then he <S%H7760>placed<s%> the <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> in <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H6532>veil;<s%>
and he <S%H6999>burned<s%> <S%H5561>fragrant<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> on it, <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
Then he <S%H7760>set<s%> up the <S%H4539>veil<s%> for the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

And he <S%H7760>set<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> [before] the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> on it the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> and the <S%H4503>meal<s%> <S%H4503>offering,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And he <S%H7760>placed<s%> the <S%H3595>laver<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> in it for <S%H7364>washing.<s%>
And from it <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H7364>washed<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> and their <S%H7272>feet.<s%>

When they <S%H935>entered<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> and when they <S%H7126>approached<s%> the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> they <S%H7364>washed,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And he <S%H6965>erected<s%> the <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H5414>hung<s%> up the <S%H4539>veil<s%> for the <S%H8179>gateway<s%> of the <S%H2691>court.<s%> Thus <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3615>finished<s%> the <S%H4399>work.<s%>
Then the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> and the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> had <S%H7931>settled<s%> on it, and the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

And throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4550>journeys<s%> whenever the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> was <S%H5927>taken<s%> up from <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> would <S%H5265>set<s%> out;
but <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> was not <S%H5927>taken<s%> up, then they did not <S%H5265>set<s%> out <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> when it was <S%H5927>taken<s%> up.

For throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4550>journeys,<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was on the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> by <S%H3119>day,<s%> and there was <S%H784>fire<s%> in it by <S%H3915>night,<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
